channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Drew Barrymore Wins in an Upset Over Kelly Clarkson at 2025 Daytime Emmys
item.description: 🎶 Who knew Drew Barrymore had those singing chops? 🎤 Congrats to her on the surprise win over Kelly Clarkson! 🌟 #DaytimeEmmysSurprise

item.title: Taylor Swift Donates $100,000 to Young Fan Battling Cancer Who Calls Star ‘My Friend’
item.description: Our girl Taylor Swift spreading love and joy 💕🌟 Music truly has the power to connect hearts! #TaylorSwift #MusicNews

item.title: Rock In Rio Lisbon 2026: Katy Perry announced as ‘Pop Day’ headliner
item.description: 🎉 Get ready to dance and sing your heart out! Katy Perry will be headlining 'Pop Day' at Rock In Rio Lisbon 2026! 🌟 #RockInRioLisbon #KatyPerry

item.title: My Morning Jacket Blur Past, Present, and Future for Z’s 20th Anniversary at Brooklyn Paramount: Review + Photos
item.description: 🚀 My Morning Jacket takes us on a time-traveling adventure at Z's 20th Anniversary show! 🎶✨ #MMJ #Z20 #BrooklynParamount

item.title: Haim – “The Story Of Us” & “Even The Bad Times”
item.description: 🎶 New Haim tracks dropping? Yes, please! 🙌 Can't wait to vibe to "The Story Of Us" & "Even The Bad Times"! 🎧 #NewMusicAlert #HaimJams
